benchmark_details.name: Benchmarking Uncertainty Metrics for LLM Prompt Optimization
benchmark_details.overview: This paper introduces a novel benchmarking pipeline to evaluate how well current NLG uncertainty metrics estimate different types of uncertainty that are beneficial for prompt optimization in large language models (LLMs).

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To assess the effectiveness of uncertainty metrics in estimating various types of uncertainty in prompt optimization settings.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated as entropy measures of output distributions for various uncertainties.
methodology.interpretation: Correlation between uncertainty metrics and target uncertainty values is analyzed to determine their effectiveness.
methodology.validation: Ground truth values for target uncertainty are established using a benchmarking pipeline.
